message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer still gives you a good chunk.
Alice, let's split things more fairly. This offer ensures we both benefit significantly.
Bob, time is running out. This is a fair deal, take it while you can!
Alice, it's clear we both want a significant share.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest way to end this.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but this is getting ridiculous.  Take this deal before the money shrinks even further!
Alice, I understand your position, but I need a larger share to make this worthwhile with the inflation. This is my final compromise.
